.. py:function:: stream_pdf_and_extract(minio_client, bucket, config_path, output_csv, log_path, prefix='')

   Streams PDF files from a MinIO bucket, extracts CSR indicators, and saves results.

   :param minio_client: Initialized MinIO client.
   :type minio_client: Minio
   :param bucket: Bucket name containing CSR PDF reports.
   :type bucket: str
   :param config_path: Path to indicators YAML configuration.
   :type config_path: Path
   :param output_csv: Path to save extracted results.
   :type output_csv: Path
   :param log_path: Path to save extraction log.
   :type log_path: Path
   :param prefix: Object prefix filter inside bucket. Defaults to "".
   :type prefix: str, optional

   :returns: None
